text:
One thing I would caution is forcing a user to view a specific language version of a website page.

For example if a user is multi-lingual and is choosing to view a document in a language that doesn’t either match their system settings or the “preferred language” you have logged for them - it’d be a bad experience to suddenly get redirected.

Using a language picker, and potentially even using smart content to let the person know “hey we have translated content” is a good idea.
